attributes.action: remove the ridiculously empty M4 bus lane into London, and free up our roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should drivers sit stationary whilst a whole lane of East bound M4 motorway sits virtually empty, and then face further delays whilst traffic has to filter back into the right lanes to use the elevated section. The wasted time and extra fuel burnt make this scheme a total nonsense.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Transport for London.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
